body:
$!If you're unhappy with the service you've received, contact the office dealing with your claim - their details will be at the top of any letters from the Disability and Carers Service.$!

Explain what has happened, how this has affected you and what you want to happen to put things right.

If you're not sure which office to contact, call the number below that best applies to you.

$C
**Disability Living Allowance and Attendance Allowance Helpline**   
**Telephone:** 0845 712 3456  
**Textphone:** 0845 722 4433

**Carer's Allowance Unit:**  
**Telephone:** 0845 608 4321    
**Textphone:** 0845 604 5312 
 
**Vaccine Damage Payments Unit**  
01772 899 944
$C

The Disability and Carers Service will try to solve your issues over the phone. They'll aim to deal with your complaint within 15 working days.

^Contact [Citizens Advice](http://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/index/getadvice.htm "Citizens Advice"){:rel="external"} or [your local MP](http://findyourmp.parliament.uk/ "find your MP"){:rel="external"} if you need help making your complaint.^ 

##If you're unhappy with the response 

You'll be asked if you want your complaint sent to the Chief Operating Officer of the Disability and Carers Service, who aims to deal with complaints within 15 working days.

If you're still unhappy, you can then [ask the Independent Case Examiner](http://www.ind-case-exam.org.uk "Independent Case Examiner"){:rel="external"} to investigate - they'll be impartial and this is free. 

If you're unhappy with the response from the Independent Case Examiner, you can [ask your MP](http://findyourmp.parliament.uk/ "contact your MP"){:rel="external"} to send your complaint to the [Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman.](http://www.ombudsman.org.uk/ "Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman"){:rel="external"}

##If a mistake has been made##

You may get a special payment if you've experienced unfair treatment or suffered financially. More information is in the Disability and Carers Service customer leaflet.

$D
[Download 'Customer information - Disability and Carers Service' (PDF, 718KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@disabled/documents/digitalasset/dg_071131.pdf "Download 'Customer information - Disability and Carers Service' (PDF, 718KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

*[DLA]: Disability Living Allowance
*[AA]: Attendance Allowance
*[MP]: Member of Parliament
overview: How to complain about the Disability and Carers Service if you're unhappy with the service you have received
title: Complain about the Disability and Carers Service
